title: Ludwig not producing hyperparameters.json file in results folder
body: **Describe the bug** Ludwig Kills itself on training and doesn't produce hyperparameters file in results folder to use for predictions **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. cd into ludwig folder 2. run train command with ```ludwig train --data_csv path/to/file.csv --model_definition "{input_features: [{name: doc_text, type: text}], output_features: [{name: class, type: category}]}"``` 3. inevitably you'll see a returned command similar to the one in the picture above 4. if you check your results/experiment_run_#/model folder there will be no hyperparameters.json file present Please provide code, yaml definition file and a sample of data in order to entirely reproduce the issue. Issues that are not reproducible will be ignored. yaml definiton: ```input_features: - name: image_path type: image encoder: stacked_cnn output_features: - name: title type: text level: word decoder: generator cell_type: lstm output_features: - name: author type: text level: word decoder: generator cell_type: lstm output_features: - name: subtitle type: text level: word decoder: generator cell_type: lstm ``` data sample: ```image_path,,,,,, ./images/snow.jpeg,,,,,, ``` ![UNADJUSTEDNONRAW_thumb_2d1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14209806/61574261-21b7d400-ab11-11e9-9111-edcd37a6c524.jpg) **Expected behavior** Expected the model to train and hyperparameters.json file to be generated **Screenshots** -- no hyperparameters.json file produced either **Environment (please complete the following information):** - OS: [e.g. iOS] Mojave - Version [e.g. 22] - Python version 3 - Ludwig version (most up to date version using ludwig install) **Additional context** Add any other context about the problem here.
